BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISWCA_CASHIER_REC_ITEM_DTL(GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, STR_BILL_NUMBER, NUM_ITEM_ID, NUM_ITEM_QTY, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PISWCA_CAN_ITEM_INVENTORY A SET A.DT_INVENT_UPDATE_DATE=?, A.NUM_CURRENT_QTY=A.NUM_CURRENT_QTY-?, A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, A.GNUM_SEAT_ID=? WHERE A.NUM_CANT_ID=? AND A.NUM_ITEM_ID=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO PISWCA_CASHIER_PAY_DTL(GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_BILL_NUMBER,DT_BILL_DATE,STR_VENDOR_NAME,STR_SUP_ORDER_NO,DT_SUP_ORDER,NUM_AMOUNT,STR_CANT_HD_CODE,STR_CANT_MIN_HD_CODE,STR_INST_NAME,STR_INST_NO,DT_INST_DATE,STR_BANK_NAME,STR_BRANCH_NAME,STR_ISSUED_BY,STR_REMARKS,STR_STATUS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, STR_INDENT_NO) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PISWCA_CASHIER_REC_DTL SET STR_RECEIVED_FROM=?, DT_RECEIVED=?, NUM_AMOUNT=?, STR_CANT_HD_CODE=?, STR_CANT_MIN_HD_CODE=?,STR_REMARKS=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE STR_BILL_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1

UPDATE PISWCA_CASHIER_PAY_DTL SET STR_VENDOR_NAME=?, STR_SUP_ORDER_NO=?, DT_SUP_ORDER=?, NUM_AMOUNT=?, STR_CANT_HD_CODE=?,STR_CANT_MIN_HD_CODE=?, STR_INST_NAME=?, STR_INST_NO=?, STR_BANK_NAME=?, STR_BRANCH_NAME=?, STR_ISSUED_BY=?, STR_REMARKS=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE STR_BILL_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1
UPDATE PISWCA_CASHIER_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_BILL_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWCA_CASHIER_REC_DTL SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_BILL_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWCA_CASHIER_PAY_DTL SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_BILL_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO PISWCA_CAN_MONEY_BAL_INVENTORY( GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_CANT_ID, DT_TRANS_DATE, NUM_OPN_BALANCE, NUM_CLS_BALANCE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE PISWCA_CAN_MONEY_BAL_INVENTORY A SET A.NUM_OPN_BALANCE=?, A.NUM_CLS_BALANCE=?, A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, A.GNUM_SEAT_ID=? WHERE A.NUM_CANT_ID=? AND A.DT_TRANS_DATE=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
